Hi. I am an economist/econometrician/data scientist working in tech.

Prior to that, I worked as an economist at the Central Bank of Ireland, and completed a PhD at University College Dublin.

I completed a PhD in economics at University College Dublin, where I was supervised by Prof Morgan Kelly.
